entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, St. Leonard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:15 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 20 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
